root.name: NBA Live 07
root.description: 1000 People OnlineMultiplayer Achievements: The Eternal Struggle. NBA Live 07 has an achievement for being online with 1000 other players which was an extreme rarity and is now impossible. EA announced that the servers for NBA Live 07 would be shut down permanently on February 2nd 2010. In a desperate fight for all achievement whores out there, many players organised one final push to get 1000 players online on 31st January 2010 before the servers went down.
